name: Chuckie Egg Challenges
description:
Summertime means relaxation, vacations, ice cream, cold drinks, and for Harry: Summer School!

And what's in this Challenge? It's twelve all-new levels for Harry to run, jump and dodge his way through. There's more ostriches, more ladders, more platforms, and yes, more Bertha!

With a mix of level difficulty, combined with new music and art, Chuckie Egg Challenges is egg-catching fun and a true test of your mobile platforming skills!

Features:
- 12 brand new levels to solve (all with unique names)
- New menu screens and updated art
- Normal and Hard difficulty modes
- Adaptive, mobile friendly controls
- Eight new music tracks
- Game Center achievements


Chuckie Egg 2017 Challenges is a stand-alone game and does not require you to own (or have played) Chuckie Egg 2017.
